mapper.sql: select d.dict_id, d.name, d.value, d.type, d.sort, d.dict_status, d.parent_type, d.del_flag, d.create_by, d.create_time, d.update_by, d.update_time, d.remark from sys_dict d
mapper.select:
where d.del_flag = 0 and d.type = 1
AND d.name like concat('%', #{dict.name}, '%')
AND d.value like concat('%', #{dict.value}, '%')
AND dict_status = #{dict.dictStatus}
and DATE_FORMAT(d.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{dict.startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(d.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{dict.endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by d.sort

where d.del_flag = 0 and d.type = 2 and d.parent_type = #{dict.parentType}
AND d.name like concat('%', #{dict.name}, '%')
AND d.value like concat('%', #{dict.value}, '%')
AND dict_status = #{dict.dictStatus}
and DATE_FORMAT(d.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{dict.startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(d.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{dict.endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by d.sort

where d.del_flag = 0 and d.type = 1
AND d.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
AND d.value like concat('%', #{value}, '%')
AND dict_status = #{dictStatus}
and DATE_FORMAT(d.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(d.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by d.sort
